amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 115-259 to increase funds in order to provide designated baby changing stations for members of the public who visit publicly accessible buildings controlled by the Architect of the Capitol, including in both male and female publicly accessible bathrooms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
